comments.author: honzab.moz@firemni.cz
comments.text:
I have just received an email addressed to few people, opening a discussion thread (not sent via any mailing list!).  The email contained attachments (zip files) viable for the discussion.

I wanted to add few other people to the discussion, so the simplest way was to do "Reply All" to preserve the list of original people participating in the thread.  But the attachment files were not included.  So I used "Forward", the attachment files are preserved, but the list of people disappeared and had to be manually added to To and Cc fields.  Not satisfactory for me.  Finally, I used "Edit this message" that does preserve the list of emails and also the attachments, but after I sent the updated email, I found out it is detached from the original thread (cannot be "Opened in conversation" with the original email).

Maybe something like "Reply all with attachments" or directly "Add more people to the thread" would be useful.  

I didn't look for an Add-on that could potentially do this, but there might be one.
